config_part.ioc_desc: TiZr Cell Monitoring. Applies SAFE_VALUE to PVONE if both PVONE and PVTWO go above PVONE_MAX and PVTWO_MAX respectively.

macro.name: PVONE
macro.description: A setpoint PV to monitor, e.g. IN:INSTNAME:EUROTHRM_01:A01:TEMP:SP

macro.name: PVTWO
macro.description: A readback PV to monitor, e.g. IN:INSTNAME:TPG361_01:2:PRESSURE

macro.name: SAFE_VALUE
macro.description: Value written to PVONE when both PVs are above their maximum limits.

macro.name: MONITORING_ON
macro.description: Whether to monitor the PVs and write the safe value or not. 1 for Yes, 0 for No.
